definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: Non-truth derived from the nature of truth, is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 非真理源出于真理的本质，是不可避免的。

sentences.english: But then, I realized it was inevitable that I had to use it
sentences.chinese: 之后才意识到，使用这个是不可避免的。
这样微妙的并列是不可避免的。

sentences.english: Inevitably, jealousy and desperation turn to enmity.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒和绝望不可避免的转化为敌意。

sentences.english: Higher level studies, however, may also have un¬avoidable methodologic flaws.
sentences.chinese: 但是较高水平的研究也有其不可避免的方法学的瑕疵。

sentences.english: Recently for a new phone, the inevitable father was a father around.
sentences.chinese: 最近换了个新手机，不可避免的到处得瑟得瑟。

sentences.english: The railway is not just inevitable, but vital to the future of Cranford.
sentences.chinese: 铁路不仅不可避免，对克兰福德的将来更是不可或缺。

sentences.english: We don't need to accept these flaws as inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 不需要接受缺陷不可避免的观点。

sentences.english: Interference of target language cultural can't be avoided in literary translation.
sentences.chinese: 译语文化在文学翻译活动中的介入不可避免。

sentences.english: A coal mining in thin seam is an inevitable issue of coal mining in many coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 薄煤层开采是许多矿井煤炭开采中不可避免的问题。

sentences.english: The problem will be how to handle the inevitable undercounting.
sentences.chinese: 不可避免的未被统计又将作何处理呢，这是个问题。

sentences.english: It is inevitable that nationality clothing would be bound to be of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 民族服装走向时装化，已是一个不可避免的趋势。

sentences.english: And so the herders moved ineluctably towards disaster.
sentences.chinese: 如此一来，牧民们不可避免地走向灾难。

sentences.english: In the end, however, the individual drowns in the sea of civilization.
sentences.chinese: 影片最后，个体不可避免地溺毙在文明的大海里。

sentences.english: Globalization and localization are both inevitable, the report says.
sentences.chinese: 报告认为，全球化和地方化都是不可避免的。

sentences.english: In some ways that is the inescapable reality of the business cycle.
sentences.chinese: 从某个角度来说，这是一种不可避免的商业周期。

definition: hard to avoid/difficult to escape from/will inevitably
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
